content.body: Rob Palmer: Hi! A colleague from a different team at Mozilla just asked me about attending the upcoming plenary as an observer. Is there any process that needs to be followed for that, or can they just show up?
content.formatted_body: Rob Palmer: Hi! A colleague from a different team at Mozilla just asked me about attending the upcoming plenary as an observer. Is there any process that needs to be followed for that, or can they just show up?

content.body: I think just notifying on the reflector thread should suffice

The July plenary meeting is coming up and it scheduled to be in Bergen, Norway!

- https://github.com/tc39/Reflector/issues/471

Please fill out [the interest survey](https://github.com/tc39/Reflector/issues/471) by Wednesday so that we can predict attendance numbers and make a call on whether it will be hybrid or remote-only.
content.formatted_body:
The July plenary meeting is coming up and it scheduled to be in Bergen, Norway!

  • https://github.com/tc39/Reflector/issues/471

Please fill out the interest survey by Wednesday so that we can predict attendance numbers and make a call on whether it will be hybrid or remote-only.

content.body: Do we have an issue tracking the details of the June plenary? I was having trouble finding one.
